post.body: good point
@jaygilmore advanced search wow! besides OR what other boolean operators are supported? anything else besides since:/until:?
@jasonalba the question that comes to mind is "why would you want to re-connect with people you disconnnected?"
How does FIOS compare $wise to Comcast or whoever you were using before?
I suppose I should have d'd that msg about "I'll be there within the hour" oh well :)
The content spam killer is in my directory but I don't know if its activated. Can you check with Adam?
have you heard of - Lots of plugins out there and Akismet comes ready installed. If not Spam Karma is good too for "comment spam"
cr8g?
thanks Mark. I appreciate the input.
18 minute video and well worth it - thanks for putting it out there Jay http://snipr.com/7thvh
Amen brother - its a plague and I don't know that there is any spam filter for a WordPress blog. Anybody know of one?
I have a particular post "A theme song for Twitter" which has attracted Twitter spam - I have to delete all from my blog GRR
Have you ever used Snag-It? It's my favorite software for screen shots, editing of same, and saving them in many formats.
RT Great post @jasonalba: Why Networking Sucks --> http://tinyurl.com/networking-sucks (I've had that post building up for a long time!)

Yes, I'll be there within the hour, ok?
You win - 63, I'll send you the link to the report
I need to buy a projector for my laptop - what's the best out there? emphasis should be on price, projection quality and portability (size)
Guy Kawaski says he could go a week without a cell phone but never a week without Twitter. What about you? http://snipr.com/7thvh video
RT Kawasaki vid by Scoble: 10-20-30 rule for pitches - 10 slides, 20 minutes, 30 pt font - GK is a big twitter fan - http://snipr.com/7thvh
